column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=UEFA Euro 2016 , quarter-finals : Germany defeats Italy 6-5 on penalties
#Text=Monday , July 4 , 2016
#Text=On Saturday , in the quarter-final of UEFA Euro 2016 , Germany defeated Italy 6 – 5 in a penalty shootout decider as the score was 1 – 1 at the end of additional time .
#Text=Germany missed three penalties in the shootout , but Manuel Neuer stopped two penalties by the Italians .
#Text=File photo of Manuel Neuer who saved two penalty kicks .
#Text=Image : Steindy .
#Text=Early in the first half , Bastian Schweinsteiger was substituted for German midfielder Sami Khedira following a muscle injury .
#Text=The Germans had greater ball possession and also led in passing accuracy .
#Text=But they had to wait till the 65th minute when Mesut Özil scored a goal .
#Text=Thirteen minutes later , the lead was nullified as the Italians were awarded a penalty kick as defender Jérôme Boateng committed a handball foul in the penalty area .
#Text=Stepping up for the penalty , Leonardo Bonucci scored the equaliser .
#Text=This was the first goal Neuer conceded in his last 557 minutes of major tournament play .
#Text=The previous record was set by Sepp Maier at 481 minutes .
#Text=The match proceeded to additional time as the score was 1 – 1 .
#Text=None of the sides could find the net in the additional time and the referee signalled a penalty shootout .
#Text=Lorenzo Insigne and Toni Kroos scored their respective kicks .
#Text=In the next round , Simone Zaza missed while Thomas Müller 's spot kick was saved by Gianluigi Buffon .
#Text=When Andrea Barzagli scored his penalty kick and Özil missed by hitting the woodwork , Italy were 2 – 1 up .
#Text=Graziano Pellè missed his penalty and the Germans levelled as Julian Draxler scored .
#Text=Leonardo Bonucci 's attempt to score was saved by Neuer , but Schweinsteiger wasted his chance to lead the shootout .
#Text=Emanuele Giaccherini and Marco Parolo scored their spot kicks , as did Mats Hummels and Joshua Kimmich .
#Text=Mattia De Sciglio 's goal was followed by Boateng 's equalising penalty .
#Text=Neuer saved Matteo Darmian 's kick and Jonas Hector scored the winning penalty .
#Text=Neuer was awarded the Man of the Match award .
#Text=Eighteen players stepped up for the penalty shootout equalling the record of the UEFA Euro 1980 third-place encounter .
#Text=Except for these two fixtures , never has a Euro match witnessed eighteen men taking the spot kick .
#Text=Germany is to play winner of France and Iceland in the semi-final .
#Text=Mats Hummels is to miss the semi-final serving a one-match ban .
#Text=Striker Mario Gomez is to miss the semi-final with torn muscle fibres .
#Text=Schweinsteiger pulled his knee ligaments .
#Text=Manager Joachim Löw responded to these injuries saying , " It is very bitter to lose important players in the decisive stage of the tournament .
